body:
Attached is a Dockerfile to reproduce the problem, with a weird `.txt` extension to make github issues happy:

[Dockerfile.txt](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/files/1529639/Dockerfile.txt)

Put the file in an empty directory and run it using:

```console
$ sudo docker -f Dockerfile.txt .
```

docker will exit with an error code, showing that the build process is broken.

I tried locally and I'm getting this error 
```
In file included from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:17:0:
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_setup.h:205:0: warning: "AF_INET6" redefined [enabled by default]
 #define AF_INET6 AF_MAX+1
 ^
In file included from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/sys/socket.h:38:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/.build/third_party/cares/cares/ares_build.h:22,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_setup.h:83,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:17:
/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/bits/socket.h:98:0: note: this is the location of the previous definition
 #define AF_INET6 PF_INET6
 ^
In file included from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_setup.h:214:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:17:
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/setup_once.h:113:8: error: redefinition of ‘struct timeval’
 struct timeval {
        ^
In file included from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/sys/time.h:27:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/setup_once.h:60,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_setup.h:214,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:17:
/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/bits/time.h:30:8: note: originally defined here
 struct timeval
        ^
In file included from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_setup.h:214:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:17:
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/setup_once.h:178:3: error: unknown type name ‘Error’
   Error Missing_definition_of_macro_sread
   ^
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/setup_once.h:209:3: error: expected ‘=’, ‘,’, ‘;’, ‘asm’ or ‘__attribute__’ before ‘Error’
   Error Missing_definition_of_macro_swrite
   ^
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/setup_once.h:209:3: error: unknown type name ‘Error’
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/setup_once.h:315:5: warning: data definition has no type or storage class [enabled by default]
   } bool;
     ^
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/setup_once.h:315:5: warning: type defaults to ‘int’ in declaration of ‘bool’ [enabled by default]
In file included from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_private.h:94:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:20:
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_ipv6.h:21:0: warning: "PF_INET6" redefined [enabled by default]
 #define PF_INET6 AF_INET6
 ^
In file included from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/sys/socket.h:38:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/.build/third_party/cares/cares/ares_build.h:22,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_setup.h:83,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:17:
/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/bits/socket.h:53:0: note: this is the location of the previous definition
 #define PF_INET6 10 /* IP version 6.  */
 ^
In file included from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_private.h:94:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:20:
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_ipv6.h:25:8: error: redefinition of ‘struct sockaddr_in6’
 struct sockaddr_in6
        ^
In file included from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares.h:68:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:19:
/usr/include/netinet/in.h:252:8: note: originally defined here
 struct sockaddr_in6
        ^
In file included from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_private.h:115:0,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:20:
/usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_writev.h:26:8: error: redefinition of ‘struct iovec’
 struct iovec
        ^
In file included from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/sys/uio.h:28:0,
                 from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/sys/socket.h:26,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/.build/third_party/cares/cares/ares_build.h:22,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares_setup.h:83,
                 from /usr/local/google/home/jtattermusch/github/grpc/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c:17:
/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/bits/uio.h:43:8: note: originally defined here
 struct iovec
        ^
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/ares.dir/third_party/cares/cares/ares__close_sockets.c.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/ares.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
